Instance configuration and data is prese: Instance configuration and data is preserved when instances are stopped. Use start to restart your instance.

Destroy the information on this instance: Destroy the information on this instance and stop billing for this instance.
Stopping an instance does not stop billi: Stopping an instance does not stop billing, your instance can be restarted after it is stopped.

It may not always be possible to resize: It may not always be possible to resize based on the constraints of your current server location.
Tags are metadata stored as key-value pa: Tags are metadata stored as key-value pairs to make it easier for you to find, sort, and identify your instances.
